summary: A 1500 year old body of one of the Knights Templar is discovered below New York's subway. Soon, a demonic minion and a modern Templar Knight are drawn to its secrets. So begins a battle for nothing less than the fate of the entire world.
cast: Dolph Lundgren|Françoise Robertson|Roc LaFortune|David Nerman|Allen Altman|Jean-Marc Bisson|Don Francks|Michael Greyeyes|Andy Bradshaw|Anik Matern|Tony Calabretta|James Bradford|Tedd Dillon|Matt Holland|Dennis St John|Michel Perron|Flint Eagle|Arthur Holden|Desmond Campbell|Jean-Marc Piché|Mike Chute|Pierre LeBlanc|Victoria Sanchez|Noel Burton|Daniel Skorzewski|Peter Cox|Goûchy Boy|Griffith Brewer|Eric Paré|Liz MacRae|Mark Trafford|John Canoe
title: El enviado
